statusTrace:
Format variables:
  hsm_base_url = 'http://cray-smd:27779'
  verify = 'False'

Source test stage (line 2205):
  - name: hsmAPIinventoryHardwareGET - Retrieve multiple Hardware Inventory entries using GET.
    request:
      url: "{hsm_base_url}/hsm/v2/Inventory/Hardware"
      method: GET
      verify: !bool "{verify}"
    response:
      status_code: 200
      verify_response_with:
        function: tavern.testutils.helpers:validate_pykwalify
        extra_kwargs:
          schema:
            type: seq
            required: True
            matching: all
            sequence:
              - type: map
                required: True

                allowempty: True
                mapping:
                  ID:
                    type: str
                    required: True
                  Type:
                    type: str
                    required: True
                  Ordinal:
                    type: int
                    required: True
                  Status:
                    type: str
                    required: True
                  HWInventoryByLocationType:
                    type: str
                    required: True
                  PopulatedFRU:
                    type: map
                    required: True

                    allowempty: True
                    mapping:
                      FRUID:
                        type: str
                        required: True
                      Type:
                        type: str
                        required: True
                      Subtype:
                        type: str
                        required: True

steps.name: Stage 0: hsmAPIinventoryHardwarePOSTcmmRectifier - Create a CMMRectifier Hardware Inventory entry using POST.
Stage 1: hsmAPIinventoryHardwareXnameGETcmmRectifier - Retrieve a CMMRectifier Hardware Inventory entry by xname using GET.
Stage 2: hsmAPIinventoryHardwarePOSTchassis - Create a Chassis Hardware Inventory entry using POST.

Stage 6: hsmAPIinventoryHardwarePOSThsnBoard - Create an HSNBoard Hardware Inventory entry using POST.

Stage 8: hsmAPIinventoryHardwarePOSTmemory - Create a Memory Hardware Inventory entry using POST.

Stage 18: hsmAPIinventoryHardwarePOSTnodeUpdate - Update a Node Hardware Inventory entry using POST.
Stage 19: hsmAPIinventoryHardwareXnameGETnodeUpdate - Retrieve an updated Node Hardware Inventory entry by xname using GET.
Stage 20: hsmAPIinventoryHardwarePOSTprocessor - Create a Processor Hardware Inventory entry using POST.
Stage 21: hsmAPIinventoryHardwareXnameGETprocessor - Retrieve a Processor Hardware Inventory entry by xname using GET.
Stage 22: hsmAPIinventoryHardwarePOSTrouterBMC - Create a RouterBMC Hardware Inventory entry using POST.
